categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Lady Meateye was a female sadistic kidnapper who operated in the Anoat sector. Several months into the lockdown of the sector by the Galactic Empire, she abducted the son of a Noble Court chamberlain and demanded a ransom. Fearing that negotiation would not be enough to ensure the young man's safe return, the Noble Court enlisted the Smuggler's help.
